item.title: C++ numerics
item.description: Prologue Bellow are my notes on using C++ for numerical applications. Multiple sources are used, I will cite them at the end or whenever appropriate.

item.title: mpFEM notes
item.description: Questions Solver params how to specify preconditioners scaling L,R,T? just number to multiply? Singularity sandbox, is like a container with the folder structure accessible

item.title: C++ notes
item.description: Introduction These are my notes about C++. Mostly experiments and running examples with org-babel within Emacs. Ideally, if you want to benefit from this, you should write, run, and understand the examples yourself.
